title: read.me
tag: Write a README like a pro!
content: Read.me is a web app that enables users to create awesome READMEs for their open-source projects with an editor, live preview and pre-made markdown elements.

title: JobFair
content: JobFair is a prograssive web app (PWA) that aims to allow young people to find reliable and secure employment without fear of being taken advantage of.

title: Hasland Magazine
content: A simple, website made by myself for a local business at their request. Hasland Magazine is delivered to 5300 homes and businesses aiming to give local residents info on upcoming events.
